oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cavalry saber carried by Lt. M. M. Box of Co. F, 10th Tenn. Cav.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Private purchase saber manufactured by Thomas Leech & Company in Memphis, Tenn. Finely acid-etched blade with "Lt. M. M. Box, Co. F, 10th (DeMoss) Tenn. Cav." Box was from a prominent planter family in the Tennessee River bottoms of Humphreys County, Tenn His father, Allen Box, was one of the wealthiest men and largest slaveowners in the county.
